name: Call Now and Chat Buttons
author: Dalinovate

sections.description:
With the “Call Now and Chat Button” plugin, give your website visitors an effortless way to reach out to you. Perfect for businesses, e-commerce stores, bloggers, and any website where customer communication is key.

Features:

  • Instant “Call Now” button for immediate phone calls.
  • Direct “Chat” button for quick chats.
  • Seamless integration with any WordPress theme.
  • User-friendly settings for easy customization.

Local Resources

This plugin includes local copies of necessary resources to ensure reliability and performance:

Bootstrap Icons: The Bootstrap Icons CSS and font files are hosted within the plugin directory. This ensures that the plugin is self-contained and not dependent on external sources for critical functionalities. The icons enhance the visual appeal and user experience of the “Call Now” and “Chat” buttons.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the call-now-and-chat-buttons folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Configure the plugin settings as desired.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin mobile-responsive?

Yes, the “Call Now” and “Chat” buttons are designed to work on both desktop and mobile devices.

Can I customize the appearance of the buttons?

Yes, you can customize the buttons’ appearance from the plugin settings.
sections.screenshots:
1. The main settings page of the plugin.

  2. The 'Call Now and Chat Buttons' as displayed on a webpage.
sections.reviews:
Very easy to use & very effective!

By flixmaxwell on January 22, 2024

This was probably the easiest plugin I have ever used! Needed to add a way for users to call us or start chat over Whatsapp directly when using mobile devices, that is exactly what this plugin does. Some nice customization options as well! GREAT PLUGIN thank you!

short_description: Add instant "Call Now" and "Chat" buttons to your website, allowing visitors to seamlessly contact you with a single click.
